text.div:
SNOMED CT Drugs not taken/completed Codes

This value set includes some not taken reason codes from SNOMED CT - provided as an exemplar

Copyright Statement: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright © 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 266710000 (Drugs not taken/completed)

contains.display: Drug not taken - patient lost tablets
Drug treatment stopped - patient ran out of tablets
Treatment stopped - patient unable to concentrate
